name: Nocturnal Artifacts
description:
Whenever Evil Awakens to corrupt the land, a chosen hero Awakens as well.

The Evil, The Hero and the Artifacts. Locked in this eternal cycle of awaking, fighting, and sleeping. Leaving behind notes of your Journey to the next hero, might just make their time easier.

This Solo Journaling game was made for the Firelights Jam. The original Firelights system is fantastic and inspired me to make this system hack to play out classic Evil/Hero/Artifact relationships.
